The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 December is 1,618,678 (2,875.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 December, there were 103,557 new confirmed cases (184.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 December, there were 84,768 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 22% (18,789 extra cases).
